articles.title: Sonos CEO discusses the Arc and customer backlash over leaving old products behind - The Verge
articles.description: Verge editor-in-chief Nilay Patel welcomes back Sonos CEO Patrick Spence to discuss the products they announced this week, including a Dolby Atmos soundbar.
articles.content: This week we saw Sonos announce several new products, most significantly the Arc, which is the companys first soundbar to support Dolby Atmos. Other new devices include the Sonos Five speaker and a refreshed Sub, and all three will only work with Sonos new S2… [+8722 chars]

articles.title: iPhone SE vs. Galaxy A51 camera comparison: Is it a slam dunk for Samsung? - CNET
articles.description: Both phones cost $400, but the Galaxy has more cameras than the iPhone. Is the Samsung Galaxy A51 really better?
articles.content:
Lexy Savvides/CNET
The Samsung Galaxy A51 is a $400 (£329, AU$599) powerhouse with four cameras that give flexibility for photography, from ultra-wide to macro. But Apple's new iPhone SE, despite only having one rear camera, has smart photography features bo… [+6865 chars]

articles.author: Patrick Holland
articles.title: Here's how the iPhone SE camera compares to the iPhone 11's setup - CNET
articles.description: We test how the $399 iPhone SE and its single rear camera compares to the $699 iPhone 11 and its dual rear cameras. It's not as straightforward as it seems.
articles.content:
The iPhone SE and iPhone 11 have different camera hardware but both are powered by the A13 Bionic processor, making photos and videos sometimes quite similar.
Angela Lang/CNET
Despite widespread enthusiasm for Apple's $399 price tag for its new iPhone SE, t… [+8289 chars]
